meanings.definition: The action or process of producing an image.
meanings.sent1: Medical imaging helps doctors see inside the body to find any problems.
meanings.sent2: The new camera uses advanced imaging technology to capture clear pictures.
meanings.sent3: I tried imaging what my dream vacation would look like, and it was so fun!
meanings.sent4: Her words painted an imaging of a peaceful meadow in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist's detailed imaging of the city skyline was truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The formation of mental images or pictures.
meanings.sent1: His storytelling was so vivid that it created clear imaging in my mind.
meanings.sent2: Children often have vivid imaging of magical creatures in their imagination.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't stop imaging a scenario where cats ruled the world - it was hilarious!
meanings.sent4: The author's words created an imaging of a storm brewing in the protagonist's mind.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's description of the historical event formed a lasting imaging in the students' minds.
